Package sbw.project.components.controller

package sbw.project.components.controller
Contains the actuator controllers.
  • Related Packages
    Package
    Description
    sbw.project.components
    Contains the controllers that the command-line interface communicates with to manipulate actuators.
    sbw.project.components.actuator
    Contains the actuators.
  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    A_Controller<_PAYLOAD_ extends A_Payload<?,?>>
    Defines the shared elements of a controller, which is a bus component that contains a subbus with actuators.
    ControllerAileron
    Defines the controller that manages ailerons.
    ControllerElevator
    Defines the controller that manages elevators.
    ControllerEngine
    Defines the controller that manages engines.
    ControllerFlap
    Defines the controller that manages flaps.
    ControllerGear
    Defines the controller that manages landing gear.
    ControllerRudder
    Defines the controller that manages a rudder.
